parts.text:
{
  "schema_version": "1.1",
  "chapters": [
    {
      "chapter_id": 1,
      "title": "Welcome to the RNG-Hellscape",
      "goal": "Introduce Artie and his broken 'Crit-Only' status in a high-stakes environment.",
      "chapter_role": "hook",
      "stakes_shift": "Artie transforms from a mundane office drone into a level 1 glitch in a lethal game world.",
      "bridge": {
        "from_prev": "N/A",
        "to_next": "Artie must find a way to survive his first night in the wild with zero defensive stats."
      },
      "pacing": {
        "intensity": 4,
        "tempo": "rush",
        "expected_scene_count": 8
      },
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "The Exit Interview",
          "intent": "Establish Artie's mundane life and sudden, absurd death.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "summary": "Artie argues with a vending machine over a bag of chips before a freak electrical surge sends him to the great login screen in the sky.",
              "type": "setup",
              "outcome": "Artie dies and enters the System's character creation void.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "introduces": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "hands_off_to": "1:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "summary": "The System, personified as a snarky UI, mocks Artie's life choices while he accidentally dumps all his points into the 'Crit' stat.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie is locked into a 'Crit or Quit' build with 1 HP and 100% Critical Hit rate.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "introduces": [
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:1",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie locks in his 'Crit or Quit' build with 1 HP and 100% Critical Hit rate.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:3"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The First Spawn",
          "intent": "Show the immediate danger of a 1 HP build in a hostile tutorial zone.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "summary": "Artie spawns in the middle of a tutorial zone and is immediately targeted by a Level 1 Slime that looks suspiciously aggressive.",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Artie realizes that in this world, '1 HP' means a stiff breeze could kill him.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:2",
              "hands_off_to": "1:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "summary": "Artie tries to punch the slime; he misses five times before landing a 'Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit' that vaporizes the slime and the tree behind it.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie gains his first level and realizes his power is terrifyingly inconsistent.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:3",
              "hands_off_to": "1:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "summary": "The System awards Artie a 'Participation Trophy' item that actually attracts monsters.",
              "type": "consequence",
              "outcome": "Artie is forced to run for his life as the tutorial zone aggros on him.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:4",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie is forced to run for his life as the tutorial zone aggros on him.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:6"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "The Safe Zone?",
          "intent": "Reach the first hub and establish the world's culture and primary rivalry.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "summary": "Artie reaches the gates of Oakhaven, where the guards are busy betting on the 'Crit-Rate' of incoming travelers.",
              "type": "transition",
              "outcome": "Artie enters the town but is flagged as a 'Statistical Anomaly' by the gate scanners.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:5",
              "hands_off_to": "1:7"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "summary": "Artie meets Barnaby, the local Tavern Keeper, who explains that 'Crits' are the only currency that matters to the local nobility.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie understands his 'broken' stat makes him a target for the powerful.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_BARNABY"
              ],
              "introduces": [
                "CHAR_BARNABY"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:6",
              "hands_off_to": "1:8"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "summary": "A high-level Paladin, Vane, notices Artie's glowing 'Anomaly' aura and decides to 'mentor' him (bully him).",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Artie makes his first rival and barely escapes a forced duel.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_VANE"
              ],
              "introduces": [
                "CHAR_VANE"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_VANE_RIVALRY"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:7",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie makes his first rival in Vane and barely escapes a forced duel."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 2,
      "title": "The Glass Cannon's Guide to Not Dying",
      "goal": "Artie needs gear that compensates for his 1 HP pool and exploits the System's bugs.",
      "chapter_role": "setup",
      "stakes_shift": "Survival shifts from pure luck to the tactical exploitation of game mechanics and item loopholes.",
      "bridge": {
        "from_prev": "Artie is a marked man in Oakhaven after being flagged as an anomaly.",
        "to_next": "Artie heads to the Low-Level Crypts to farm 'Evasion' gear and test his build."
      },
      "pacing": {
        "intensity": 3,
        "tempo": "steady",
        "expected_scene_count": 9
      },
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "Shopping for Scraps",
          "intent": "Equip Artie with the bare minimum to survive a dungeon through exploits.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "summary": "Artie tries to sell his 'Participation Trophy' but finds out it's soul-bound and cursed.",
              "type": "choice",
              "outcome": "Artie is stuck with a lighthouse-beacon for monsters.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "hands_off_to": "2:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "summary": "Fizz points out a loophole in the 'Starter Pack' quest that allows Artie to steal a high-tier cloak if he can crit a lock.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie successfully crits a lock, causing it to explode into gold dust.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:1",
              "hands_off_to": "2:3"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "summary": "Artie acquires the 'Cloak of the Cowardly Lion,' which gives +50 Evasion but -100 Dignity.",
              "type": "aftermath",
              "outcome": "Artie is now slightly harder to hit but looks like a neon yellow cat.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:2",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie acquires the 'Cloak of the Cowardly Lion' and a cursed beacon item.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:4"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The Crypt of Bad Math",
          "intent": "Test the new gear and the Crit-build in a controlled environment.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "summary": "Artie enters the Crypts and finds that the skeletons move in predictable, turn-based patterns.",
              "type": "setup",
              "outcome": "Artie begins to treat the world like a rhythm game.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:3",
              "hands_off_to": "2:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "summary": "A Skeleton Archer fires at Artie; the Cloak's evasion procs, causing Artie to do an accidental backflip.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie survives his first ranged encounter and gains confidence.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:4",
              "hands_off_to": "2:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "summary": "Artie realizes his crits don't just do damage; they cause 'System Overload' effects like turning enemies into loot-filled pinatas.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie discovers he can farm resources via System Overload effects.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:5",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie discovers he can farm resources via System Overload effects.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:7"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "The Rival's Shadow",
          "intent": "Reintroduce Vane as a persistent threat and trigger the boss encounter.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "summary": "Vane enters the crypts with a full party, clearing rooms with ease while Artie hides in a sarcophagus.",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Artie sees the gap between a 'proper' build and his own.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_VANE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:6",
              "hands_off_to": "2:8"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "summary": "Vane's party leaves behind a 'Boss Trigger'\u2014a rare item that summons a Floor Guardian.",
              "type": "choice",
              "outcome": "Artie decides to take the risk and summon the boss for the massive XP.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:7",
              "hands_off_to": "2:9"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 9,
              "summary": "The Floor Guardian, a Bone Golem, emerges, and Artie realizes he forgot to check its 'Minimum Damage' stat.",
              "type": "consequence",
              "outcome": "The boss battle begins with Artie at a massive disadvantage.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:8",
              "end_condition_echo": "The Bone Golem emerges, placing Artie at a massive mechanical disadvantage."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 3,
      "title": "Math-Boss vs. The Glitch",
      "goal": "Defeat the Floor Guardian and secure the first major loot drop of the series.",
      "chapter_role": "pressure",
      "stakes_shift": "Artie transitions from a lucky survivor to a Level 10 'Anomaly' with a reputation for breaking bosses.",
      "bridge": {
        "from_prev": "The Bone Golem is summoned, forcing Artie into a fight he isn't built for.",
        "to_next": "Artie flees the crypts with legendary-tier items and a high-level rival on his heels."
      },
      "pacing": {
        "intensity": 5,
        "tempo": "steady",
        "expected_scene_count": 10
      },
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "The Dance of Death",
          "intent": "A high-octane fight where Artie must dodge every single attack.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "summary": "Artie uses the Crypt environment to kite the Bone Golem, using 'Crit-Punches' to chip away at its armor.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The Golem's armor is shattered, but Artie is running out of stamina.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "hands_off_to": "3:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "summary": "Fizz discovers that the Golem has a 'Crit-Resist' buff, making Artie's main weapon useless.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie must find a way to bypass the resistance or die.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:1",
              "hands_off_to": "3:3"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "summary": "Artie attempts to 'Crit' the ground beneath the Golem, hoping for a physics glitch.",
              "type": "choice",
              "outcome": "The floor collapses, trapping the Golem in a hole.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:2",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie collapses the floor, trapping the Golem in a physics glitch.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:4"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The Final Blow",
          "intent": "Resolve the boss fight with a comedic but effective exploit.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "summary": "While the Golem is stuck, Artie spends five minutes 'charging' a punch, which the System interprets as a 'Heavy Attack'.",
              "type": "setup",
              "outcome": "Artie prepares his most powerful hit yet.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:3",
              "hands_off_to": "3:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "summary": "Artie lands the hit, but instead of damage, the System rolls a 'Cosmetic Crit,' turning the Golem into a pile of very expensive porcelain teacups.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The boss is defeated, but the loot is... unconventional.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:4",
              "hands_off_to": "3:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "summary": "The System panics and tries to 'recalculate' the XP, resulting in Artie jumping five levels instantly.",
              "type": "aftermath",
              "outcome": "Artie is now Level 10, but the System is watching him more closely.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:5",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie hits Level 10 and the System begins monitoring him closely.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:7"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "Looting the Teacups",
          "intent": "Examine the rewards and the consequences of the fight.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "summary": "Artie finds a 'Ring of the Gambler' among the teacups, which doubles crit damage but makes every 20th hit a self-crit.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie accepts the double-edged sword.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:6",
              "hands_off_to": "3:8"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "summary": "A hidden door opens, revealing a mural of the 'First Glitch'\u2014a hero who looked suspiciously like Artie's high school gym teacher.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie realizes he isn't the first person to break this game.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_THE_ASCENSION"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:7",
              "hands_off_to": "3:9"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 9,
              "summary": "Artie exits the crypt to find Vane waiting for him, looking very confused by the lack of a boss.",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Vane realizes Artie stole his kill.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_VANE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:8",
              "hands_off_to": "3:10"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 10,
              "summary": "Artie uses his new level-up speed to outrun Vane's party, heading toward the capital city.",
              "type": "transition",
              "outcome": "The chase is on.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_VANE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:9",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie uses his new speed to outrun Vane's party toward the capital."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 4,
      "title": "The Capital of Crits",
      "goal": "Artie must navigate the social and political landscape of the capital while avoiding the 'System Police'.",
      "chapter_role": "investigation",
      "stakes_shift": "The threat moves from physical monsters to social exposure and the risk of permanent character deletion.",
      "bridge": {
        "from_prev": "Artie arrives at the capital as a fugitive from Vane's ego.",
        "to_next": "Artie enters the Grand Arena tournament to win a way to fix his HP."
      },
      "pacing": {
        "intensity": 2,
        "tempo": "slow_burn",
        "expected_scene_count": 8
      },
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "The City of Gold and Glitches",
          "intent": "Establish the capital city and the religious weight of 'Crits'.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "summary": "Artie enters the city and sees the 'Temple of the D20,' where priests pray for high rolls.",
              "type": "setup",
              "outcome": "Artie realizes he is basically a walking god in this religion, connecting his fate to the First Glitch.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_THE_ASCENSION"
              ],
              "hands_off_to": "4:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "summary": "Artie tries to find a 'Stat-Wiper' to fix his 1 HP, but finds out it's a crime punishable by 'Deletion'.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie realizes his 1 HP build is permanent and illegal to fix.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:1",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie realizes his 1 HP build is permanent and illegal to fix.",
              "hands_off_to": "4:3"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The Underground Market",
          "intent": "Artie looks for illegal mods to help him survive.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "summary": "Fizz leads Artie to a black market run by a group of 'Dev-Haters' who sell items that bypass System rules.",
              "type": "transition",
              "outcome": "Artie gains access to a 'Lag-Switch' potion.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:2",
              "hands_off_to": "4:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "summary": "Artie meets Zero, a black-market informant who tells him that Vane is the son of the High Priest of RNG.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "The rivalry with Vane just became a religious war.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_ZERO"
              ],
              "introduces": [
                "CHAR_ZERO"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_VANE_RIVALRY"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:3",
              "hands_off_to": "4:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "summary": "The black market is raided by the 'System Sentinels,' and Artie has to use his first 'Lag-Switch' to escape.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie escapes a Sentinel raid with a Lag-Switch potion and a binary speech curse.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_SYSTEM_GLITCH"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:4",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie escapes a Sentinel raid with a Lag-Switch potion and a binary speech curse.",
              "hands_off_to": "4:6"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "The Arena Invitation",
          "intent": "Set up the tournament climax and the high financial stakes.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "summary": "Artie sees a flyer for the 'Grand Crit-Off,' where the prize is a 'Shield of Infinite Health'.",
              "type": "choice",
              "outcome": "Artie decides to enter, despite the risk of exposure.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:5",
              "hands_off_to": "4:7"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "summary": "Artie registers under the name 'Crit-iculous' and accidentally sets his entry fee to 'All My Gold'.",
              "type": "consequence",
              "outcome": "Artie is now broke and must win the tournament to survive.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:6",
              "hands_off_to": "4:8"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "summary": "Vane sees the name on the roster and smiles, knowing he can finally 'delete' Artie in front of a crowd.",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Vane prepares to 'delete' Artie in the upcoming tournament.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_VANE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:7",
              "end_condition_echo": "Vane prepares to 'delete' Artie in the upcoming tournament."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 5,
      "title": "The Tournament of Tiers",
      "goal": "Artie must win the tournament brackets without taking a single point of damage.",
      "chapter_role": "trial",
      "stakes_shift": "Artie becomes a public icon, making him a primary target for the System's 'balancing' algorithms.",
      "bridge": {
        "from_prev": "Artie is the underdog in the arena.",
        "to_next": "Artie reaches the finals against Vane, who has rigged the game."
      },
      "pacing": {
        "intensity": 4,
        "tempo": "steady",
        "expected_scene_count": 11
      },
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "The Round of 32",
          "intent": "Show Artie's growth and tactical use of his crits in the arena.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "summary": "Artie faces a 'Tank' who has 10,000 HP. Artie wins in one second by critting the Tank's belt buckle, causing his armor to fall off and disqualify him.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The crowd goes wild; Artie is the 'One-Hit Wonder'.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "hands_off_to": "5:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "summary": "The System tries to nerf Artie mid-match by introducing 'Wind Resistance'.",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Artie has to learn to time his punches with the wind gusts.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:1",
              "hands_off_to": "5:3"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "summary": "Artie wins the second round by critting the air so hard it creates a vacuum, sucking his opponent out of the ring.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie moves to the quarter-finals despite mid-match System nerfs.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:2",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie moves to the quarter-finals despite mid-match System nerfs.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:4"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The Quarter-Finals: The Mirror Match",
          "intent": "Artie faces a character with high evasion, forcing a change in strategy.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "summary": "Artie's opponent is a 'Dodge-Build' rogue who also has low HP.",
              "type": "setup",
              "outcome": "The fight becomes a high-speed game of tag.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:3",
              "hands_off_to": "5:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "summary": "Neither can land a hit for ten minutes. The crowd starts booing.",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Artie realizes he needs to change his strategy.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:4",
              "hands_off_to": "5:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "summary": "Artie uses his 'Participation Trophy' to lure a swarm of arena-flies, which distract the rogue just long enough for a crit.",
              "type": "choice",
              "outcome": "Artie wins, but the 'Trophy' is now glowing with dark energy.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_SYSTEM_GLITCH"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:5",
              "hands_off_to": "5:7"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "summary": "The System issues a 'Warning' to Artie for 'Unsportsmanlike Exploitation'.",
              "type": "consequence",
              "outcome": "The System applies a 'Random Debuff' to Artie for his next match.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:6",
              "end_condition_echo": "The System applies a 'Random Debuff' to Artie for his next match.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:8"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "The Semi-Finals: The Debuff",
          "intent": "Artie must overcome a mechanical handicap (Inverted Controls).",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "summary": "Artie's debuff is 'Inverted Controls'. Every time he tries to move left, he goes right.",
              "type": "setup",
              "outcome": "Artie looks like he's drunk-fighting.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:7",
              "hands_off_to": "5:9"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 9,
              "summary": "Artie's opponent is a Mage who uses AOE spells. Artie has to 'moonwalk' through the fireballs.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie manages to reach the Mage and lands a crit that turns the Mage's staff into a rubber chicken.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:8",
              "hands_off_to": "5:10"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 10,
              "summary": "The Mage surrenders out of pure embarrassment.",
              "type": "aftermath",
              "outcome": "Artie reaches the finals.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:9",
              "hands_off_to": "5:11"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 11,
              "summary": "Vane watches from the wings, holding a 'System Override' scroll he bought from the black market.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie reaches the finals against a rigged Vane.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_VANE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:10",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie reaches the finals against a rigged Vane."

          ]

    {
      "chapter_id": 6,
      "title": "The Final Roll",
      "goal": "Defeat Vane in the rigged finals and survive the System's direct intervention.",
      "chapter_role": "climax",
      "stakes_shift": "The survival of the entire game world is threatened as Artie's crits begin to unravel the source code.",
      "bridge": {
        "from_prev": "Artie enters the ring for the final match.",
        "to_next": "The System crashes, leaving Artie and Fizz stranded in the wreckage of the world."
      },
      "pacing": {
        "intensity": 5,
        "tempo": "rush",
        "expected_scene_count": 12
      },
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "Vane's Ultimate Build",
          "intent": "Show the power of a 'Whale' player vs. a 'Glitch' player.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "summary": "Vane enters with legendary armor that reflects 50% of all damage. Artie realizes if he crits Vane, he crits himself.",
              "type": "setup",
              "outcome": "Artie's main weapon is now a suicide button.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_VANE"
              ],
              "hands_off_to": "6:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "summary": "Vane uses the 'System Override' scroll to turn off Artie's Evasion stat.",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Artie is now a 1 HP character who can't dodge.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_VANE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:1",
              "hands_off_to": "6:3"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "summary": "Fizz sacrifices her 'Guide' status to temporarily hack the arena's gravity, giving Artie a few seconds of weightlessness.",
              "type": "choice",
              "outcome": "Artie can move in 3D, bypassing the 'No-Evasion' ground rule.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:2",
              "hands_off_to": "6:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "summary": "Artie realizes he doesn't need to hit Vane; he needs to hit the 'Reflect' buff itself.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie targets the magic aura around Vane's armor to bypass the Reflect buff.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:3",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie targets the magic aura around Vane's armor to bypass the Reflect buff.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:5"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "Breaking the Game",
          "intent": "The moment of peak absurdity where the world begins to dissolve.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "summary": "Artie lands a 'Meta-Crit' on the Reflect buff. The System can't handle the math of a crit reflecting a crit reflecting a crit.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The arena begins to pixelate and dissolve.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_VANE"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:4",
              "hands_off_to": "6:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "summary": "Vane panics as his armor turns into a swarm of error messages.",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Vane is defenseless and terrified.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_VANE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:5",
              "hands_off_to": "6:7"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "summary": "Artie delivers the final blow—a crit so powerful it deletes Vane's character data (but not the person).",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Vane is kicked from the game, and Artie is the champion of a broken world.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_VANE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:6",
              "hands_off_to": "6:8"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "summary": "The System Administrator (a giant floating head) appears to manually delete Artie.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "The true antagonist is revealed.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_BOSS"
              ],
              "introduces": [
                "CHAR_BOSS"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:7",
              "hands_off_to": "6:9"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 9,
              "summary": "Artie crits the Admin's 'Delete' button, causing the entire world to freeze.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie has successfully 'paused' reality.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:8",
              "hands_off_to": "6:10"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 10,
              "summary": "Fizz uses the pause to rewrite Artie's location data, teleporting them out of the arena.",
              "type": "choice",
              "outcome": "Artie and Fizz escape deletion as the world enters 'Safe Mode'.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:9",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie and Fizz escape deletion as the world enters 'Safe Mode'.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:11"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "The Aftermath of the Crash",
          "intent": "Show the immediate consequences of the reality crash.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 11,
              "summary": "Artie and Fizz wake up in a 'Null-Zone' where the graphics are all wireframes.",
              "type": "aftermath",
              "outcome": "They are safe for now, but the world is dying.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:10",
              "hands_off_to": "6:12"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 12,
              "summary": "Artie looks at his stats and sees his HP is now 'NaN' (Not a Number).",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie realizes his HP is now 'NaN' and he has become a virus.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_SYSTEM_GLITCH"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:11",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie realizes his HP is now 'NaN' and he has become a virus."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 7,
      "title": "Rebooting for the Sequel",
      "goal": "Establish a new status quo and set the long-term quest to reach the Server Room.",
      "chapter_role": "aftermath",
      "stakes_shift": "Artie is no longer just a player; he has become a multiversal virus and the most wanted entity in the game.",
      "bridge": {
        "from_prev": "Artie and Fizz wake up in the Null-Zone after the reality crash.",
        "to_next": "Artie joins the Beta-Tester resistance to begin the quest for the Source Code."
      },
      "pacing": {
        "intensity": 2,
        "tempo": "slow_burn",
        "expected_scene_count": 8
      },
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "The New Normal",
          "intent": "Establish the new status quo for Artie and Fizz in the Null-Zone.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "summary": "Artie learns how to eat 'Data-Packets' instead of food.",
              "type": "setup",
              "outcome": "Artie adapts to his new existence.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "hands_off_to": "7:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "summary": "Fizz explains that the only way to save the world is to reach the 'Server Room' at the center of the world.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "The long-term goal is established.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_THE_ASCENSION"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:1",
              "hands_off_to": "7:3"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "summary": "Artie tests his 'NaN' HP by jumping off a cliff; he doesn't die, he just clips through the floor and ends up back at the top.",
              "type": "choice",
              "outcome": "Artie realizes his immortality is as glitchy and annoying as his 1 HP build.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:2",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie realizes his immortality is as glitchy and annoying as his 1 HP build.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:4"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The Resistance",
          "intent": "Introduce the Beta-Tester faction and the long-term goal.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "summary": "A group of 'Beta-Testers' led by Zero finds Artie in the Null-Zone.",
              "type": "transition",
              "outcome": "Artie finds allies who know the world's secrets.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_ZERO"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:3",
              "hands_off_to": "7:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "summary": "Zero reveals that Vane is still alive and has been 'upgraded' by the System to be a 'Patch-Hunter'.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "The rivalry continues with higher stakes.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_ZERO"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_VANE_RIVALRY"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:4",
              "hands_off_to": "7:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "summary": "Artie receives his first 'Legendary' quest: 'Delete the Admin'.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "The series quest to 'Delete the Admin' is officially locked in.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:5",
              "end_condition_echo": "The series quest to 'Delete the Admin' is officially locked in.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:7"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "The First Step",
          "intent": "End on a high note of action and anticipation for the sequel.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "summary": "Artie, Fizz, and Zero prepare to leave the Null-Zone and head to the 'Glitch-Woods'.",
              "type": "transition",
              "outcome": "The journey begins anew.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ",
                "CHAR_ZERO"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:6",
              "hands_off_to": "7:8"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "summary": "Artie looks at the sky and says, 'I hope the next world has better drop rates,' before stepping into a portal.",
              "type": "aftermath",
              "outcome": "Artie steps into a portal to the Glitch-Woods, ending Book 1.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:7",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie steps into a portal to the Glitch-Woods, ending Book 1."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ],

text:
{
  "schema_version": "1.1",
  "chapters": [
    {
      "chapter_id": 1,
      "title": "Welcome to the RNG-Hellscape",
      "goal": "Introduce Artie and his broken 'Crit-Only' status in a high-stakes environment.",
      "chapter_role": "hook",
      "stakes_shift": "Artie transforms from a mundane office drone into a level 1 glitch in a lethal game world.",
      "bridge": {
        "from_prev": "N/A",
        "to_next": "Artie must find a way to survive his first night in the wild with zero defensive stats."
      },
      "pacing": {
        "intensity": 4,
        "tempo": "rush",
        "expected_scene_count": 8
      },
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "The Exit Interview",
          "intent": "Establish Artie's mundane life and sudden, absurd death.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "summary": "Artie argues with a vending machine over a bag of chips before a freak electrical surge sends him to the great login screen in the sky.",
              "type": "setup",
              "outcome": "Artie dies and enters the System's character creation void.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "introduces": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "hands_off_to": "1:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "summary": "The System, personified as a snarky UI, mocks Artie's life choices while he accidentally dumps all his points into the 'Crit' stat.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie is locked into a 'Crit or Quit' build with 1 HP and 100% Critical Hit rate.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "introduces": [
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:1",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie locks in his 'Crit or Quit' build with 1 HP and 100% Critical Hit rate.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:3"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The First Spawn",
          "intent": "Show the immediate danger of a 1 HP build in a hostile tutorial zone.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "summary": "Artie spawns in the middle of a tutorial zone and is immediately targeted by a Level 1 Slime that looks suspiciously aggressive.",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Artie realizes that in this world, '1 HP' means a stiff breeze could kill him.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:2",
              "hands_off_to": "1:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "summary": "Artie tries to punch the slime; he misses five times before landing a 'Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit' that vaporizes the slime and the tree behind it.",
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie gains his first level and realizes his power is terrifyingly inconsistent.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_CRIT_EXPLOIT"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:3",
              "hands_off_to": "1:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "summary": "The System awards Artie a 'Participation Trophy' item that actually attracts monsters.",
              "type": "consequence",
              "outcome": "Artie is forced to run for his life as the tutorial zone aggros on him.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:4",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie is forced to run for his life as the tutorial zone aggros on him.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:6"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "The Safe Zone?",
          "intent": "Reach the first hub and establish the world's culture and primary rivalry.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "summary": "Artie reaches the gates of Oakhaven, where the guards are busy betting on the 'Crit-Rate' of incoming travelers.",
              "type": "transition",
              "outcome": "Artie enters the town but is flagged as a 'Statistical Anomaly' by the gate scanners.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:5",
              "hands_off_to": "1:7"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "summary": "Artie meets Barnaby, the local Tavern Keeper, who explains that 'Crits' are the only currency that matters to the local nobility.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie understands his 'broken' stat makes him a target for the powerful.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_BARNABY"
              ],
              "introduces": [
                "CHAR_BARNABY"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:6",
              "hands_off_to": "1:8"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "summary": "A high-level Paladin, Vane, notices Artie's glowing 'Anomaly' aura and decides to 'mentor' him (bully him).",
              "type": "escalation",
              "outcome": "Artie makes his first rival and barely escapes a forced duel.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_VANE"
              ],
              "introduces": [
                "CHAR_VANE"
              ],
              "threads": [
                "THREAD_VANE_RIVALRY"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:7",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie makes his first rival in Vane and barely escapes a forced duel."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 2,
      "title": "The Glass Cannon's Guide to Not Dying",
      "goal": "Artie needs gear that compensates for his 1 HP pool and exploits the System's bugs.",
      "chapter_role": "setup",
      "stakes_shift": "Survival shifts from pure luck to the tactical exploitation of game mechanics and item loopholes.",
      "bridge": {
        "from_prev": "Artie is a marked man in Oakhaven after being flagged as an anomaly.",
        "to_next": "Artie heads to the Low-Level Crypts to farm 'Evasion' gear and test his build."
      },
      "pacing": {
        "intensity": 3,
        "tempo": "steady",
        "expected_scene_count": 9
      },
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "Shopping for Scraps",
          "intent": "Equip Artie with the bare minimum to survive a dungeon through exploits.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "summary": "Artie tries to sell his 'Participation Trophy' but finds out it's soul-bound and cursed.",
              "type": "choice",
              "outcome": "Artie is stuck with a lighthouse-beacon for monsters.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "hands_off_to": "2:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "summary": "Fizz points out a loophole in the 'Starter Pack' quest that allows Artie to steal a high-tier cloak if he can crit a lock.",
              "type": "reveal",
              "outcome": "Artie successfully crits a lock, causing it to explode into gold dust.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE",
                "CHAR_FIZZ"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:1",
              "hands_off_to": "2:3"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "summary": "Artie acquires the 'Cloak of the Cowardly Lion,' which gives +50 Evasion but -100 Dignity.",
              "type": "aftermath",
              "outcome": "Artie is now slightly harder to hit but looks like a neon yellow cat.",
              "characters": [
                "CHAR_ARTIE"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:2",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie acquires the 'Cloak of the Cowardly Lion' and a cursed beacon item.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:4"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
